text: Imagine a vast sheet of paper on which straight Lines, Triangles, Squares, Pentagons, Hexagons, and other figures, instead of remaining fixed in their places, move freely about, on or in the surface, but without the power of rising above or sinking below it, very much like shadows only hard and with luminous edges and you will then have a pretty correct notion of my country and countrymen Alas, a few years ag0, I should have said universe but now my mind has been opened to higher views of smasn ~a4 ~lut c Tape 0 ^ AA M4 Lnw _ Tisnz Squa Kexarmn ~un kien ihnX ^umaincnd hut X Akun met Qaely ubowk , Ak mkul Buu m/houl Mu mn aber 87 Luebw 4 vru} hs Mhade Ruvd ~iMs Qumunen ut and sm ~iy Mcn Rsue 4 rrlls ~n 4 my and vunkvytn ~ean 4 I~ Aa at 1 a loull lex muy Amnenl bul Aw m mundl A Aseus) An "my things.
